name: Boris in the Cave (Marian Dumitriu)
description:
Boris in the Cave is a walking simulator game that was done in collaboration with the 3d Animation students.

Who is Boris? Well that's you... the player character. You start in a shadowy cave,

 Explore and enjoy the different environments.

The controls are simple: W/A/S/D or Arrows to move & E to interact.

Credits: Gaya Leigh, Arianna Querin , Steven Taylor and Marian Dumitriu.
